Title: Premier Zhou on a visit to India
Designer: Zhang Biwu (张碧梧)Xin Liliang (忻礼良)
Publisher: Shanghai tupian chubanshe (上海图片出版社)
Notes: Zhou Enlai on his state visit to India, June 1954. Standing next to him in the car is Jawaharlal Nehru. The Taj Mahal is in the background.This is a print from the 19th impression (August 1958).
